title: (Pwn2Own) Microsoft Teams WebView Incorrect Privilege Assignment Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Microsoft Teams. No user interaction is required if the attacker and target are in the same Teams organization and are both participants in a meeting.
The specific flaw exists within handling of WebViews. The issue results from the creation of a WebView with inappropriate privileges. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.
timeline:
2022-05-26 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-11-21 - Coordinated public release of advisory
